options.description: High-speed Wi-Fi service suitable for streaming, gaming, and heavy internet usage.

options.description: Flexibility to rent Wi-Fi on an hourly basis.

options.name: Business Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Enterprise-grade Wi-Fi service suitable for businesses and large groups.

options.name: Traveler's Wi-Fi Pass
options.description: Wi-Fi service designed for travelers offering coverage in multiple locations.

options.name: Family Wi-Fi Plan
options.description: Wi-Fi service package for families with multiple devices and users.

options.name: Event Wi-Fi Rental
options.description: Temporary Wi-Fi service for events, conferences, and gatherings.

options.name: Emergency Wi-Fi Backup
options.description: Backup Wi-Fi service for emergencies or as a secondary connection.
features: Peace of mind in case of primary connection failure
